name: streetfight
description: Hacky streetfight app, will probably go nowhere

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run resetdb && uvicorn backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.dev_both: concurrently "cd react-ui && npm start" "npm run backend"
scripts.backend: (npm run resetdb || true) && uvicorn backend.main:app --reload --reload-dir backend
scripts.browsers: python -c 'from tests.test_selenium import make_N_drivers; import sys; drvs=make_N_drivers(int(sys.argv[1])); [d.get(sys.argv[2]) for d in drvs]'
scripts.bootstrap: npm i && npm run gen_cert && npm run build && cp .env.example .env
